item.description:
3/8/09 UPDATE: TRIP IS SOLD OUT! We have large group of fun and adventurous members coming from all over the US and Canada. At this point we are sold out (in just under 3 months!), but we have more exciting club tours currently offered or on the way!

--------------------------------------------------------

We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on this exciting adventure to Peru!

Join the club on a group tour May 2-9, 2009 to Machu Picchu and the Peruvian Amazon. This is an exciting 8 day adventure to two of South America's most incredible wonders. This tour is an excellent option for those who wish to see the best of Peru with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Space will go very quickly (the Costa Rica club trip that the club put together for Feb 2009 SOLD OUT in just over 2 months) so be sure get your spot early!

For details, check out the Global Expeditions Club website or go directly to the Head Out Adventures booking page, the club's tour supplier.

Places Visited: Machu Picchu, Amazon Rainforest in Peru, Lima, Cusco, Sacred Valley of the Incas, Puerto Maldonado, Tambopata National Rainforest Reserve

This tour is being organized by The Global Expeditions Club. For more information, including a detailed itinerary, please visit their website... or contact them at:
E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

Make Friends. Travel the WorldÂ®
item.name: 8 Day Group Tour to Peru (Machu Picchu & the Amazon)
